Record.ClassificationPath: Immune System Diseases/Hypersensitivity/Hypersensitivity, Immediate/Respiratory Hypersensitivity/Rhinitis, Allergic, Perennial
Respiratory Tract Diseases/Respiratory Hypersensitivity/Rhinitis, Allergic, Perennial
Respiratory Tract Diseases/Nose Diseases/Rhinitis/Rhinitis, Allergic, Perennial
Record.Description: Inflammation of the mucous membrane of the nose similar to that found in hay fever except that symptoms persist throughout the year. The causes are usually air-borne allergens, particularly dusts, feathers, molds, animal fur, etc.
